Reviews.Title: Don't have a problem with this set
Reviews.Author: bk507
Reviews.Content: I have had this same set for 2 years.  The Remote died.  Universal Remotes will not work.  No place locally or on the internet can I find a replacement aRemote or the remote codes that will work for this set.  Without a remote,you can't switch to AV to watch a DVD since there is no "enter" button on thecontrols on the side of the TV.  Have tried for several days to find a remote that works and have had no luck.  If you google Telesonic, you willfind a website in spanish I believe but nothing on how to get a remote.  The Manual is generic and only says "32inch LCD" and has little info onthe set.  The remote doesn't even have a brand name on it or model number.  It looks like someone buys these and then names it what ever they wantand sell it for whatever price they want.  The back of the set says "32" LCD, made in China".  Go to the big box stores and get a name brand setfor half the price.
